title: feat: add OVH Whisper speech-to-text transcription
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Adds Whisper Large V3 speech-to-text transcription capabilities to the API with transparent per-second billing.
gist.impact: Developers can now transcribe audio files directly through the pollinations.ai API using the high-quality Whisper model.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee wearing headphones, acting as a stenographer. It is listening to a glowing lime green audio waveform and watching it magically transform into pixelated text bubbles. Represents the conversion of sound to language.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee wearing headphones, watching a glowing audio waveform transform into floating pixel text. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Bee mascot with chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text bubbles. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
